articles.content:
Mikaela Shiffrin is setting all sorts of records this winter. (Photo by Jonas Ericsson/Agence Zoom/Getty Images)
Mikaela Shiffrin's record-setting winter continued Saturday when she became the winni… [+2547 chars]
